per.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: How much does it cost per kilo?
My car does 12 miles per litre  (=for each litre of petrol).
The meal cost $25 per head (=for or by each person).
per.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: an average beef cattle price of $74.20 per hundred pounds
The price tag is $1500 per square foot of retail space.
Earnings per share rose 12% to 31.3 pence.
The Japanese have in recent years reported a higher income per person than the Americans.
per.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: How many calls do you make per day?
a train travelling at 150 miles per hour
